text: Ouhoumoudou Mahamadou (born 1954)https://rulers.org/indexm1.html is a Nigerien politician. He was the 15th Prime Minister of Niger, from 3 April 2021 until 27 July 2023. == References == Category:Prime Ministers of Niger Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Bankers
title: Ouhoumoudou Mahamadou
